title: How to Make Truffles Dipped in White Chocolate

steps.headline: Crush two packets of Oreo biscuits in a food processor.
Add cheese when it seems to get smoother.
steps.description: Before adding remember to cut the cheese into pieces.

steps.headline: Turn the food processor on for five seconds.
Keep the dough in the freezer for half-an-hour when it's ready.
Make balls out of the dough after taking it out of the freezer.
steps.description:

steps.headline: Melt two chocolate bars in the pan or in a microwave until then.
Take out the balls and cover them with the chocolate.
Select your toppings, crushed grahams or sprinkles will do.
Keep them in the freezer for 15 minutes.

text:
Crush two packets of Oreo biscuits in a food processor. Add cheese when it seems to get smoother. Before adding remember to cut the cheese into pieces. Turn the food processor on for five seconds. Check the crumbs. Keep the dough in the freezer for half-an-hour when it's ready. Make balls out of the dough after taking it out of the freezer. Keep it for 15 minutes in the freezer. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/ce\/Make-Truffles-Dipped-in-White-Chocolate-Step-6Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Truffles-Dipped-in-White-Chocolate-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/ce\/Make-Truffles-Dipped-in-White-Chocolate-Step-6Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Truffles-Dipped-in-White-Chocolate-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Melt two chocolate bars in the pan or in a microwave until then. Take out the balls and cover them with the chocolate. Select your toppings, crushed grahams or sprinkles will do. Add toppings of your choice. Keep them in the freezer for 15 minutes. Serve with white sauce. Yum!
